action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the terrorist attacks by Hamas and denounces the rhetoric of anti-Israel, pro-Hamas student groups. It also acknowledges that Israel has the right to exist and defend itself and encourages the U.S. government to fully support Israel and these rights.
